name: The blue Dwarf
description:
Can You help escape all ships (with hundreds of mouseclicks) from the gravity pull of the black hole! 

"After a mysterious event... in the uneventful solar system of a blue Sun, suddenly a blackhole appears. Threatening to swallow all ships in the vicinity."

Controls:

WASD - camera controls

Mouse Left Button (repeatedly) - add velocity to the ships

Thanks for playing my Game!
